thread.title: BRIEF-Lemelson Capital Management Says Urging Geospace Technologies' Board To Explore Immediate Sale Of Co

title: BRIEF-Lemelson Capital Management Says Urging Geospace Technologies' Board To Explore Immediate Sale Of Co

organizations.name: technologies' board to explore immediate sale of co reuters

text:
February 9, 2018 / 2:47 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Lemelson Capital Management Says Urging Geospace Technologies' Board To Explore Immediate Sale Of Co Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Lemelson Capital Management: 
* LEMELSON CAPITAL MANAGEMENT SAYS IS URGING GEOSPACE TECHNOLOGIES CORPâ€˜S BOARD TO EXPLORE IMMEDIATE SALE OF COMPANY 
* LEMELSON CAPITAL MANAGEMENT SAYS IS CALLING ON BOARD OF GEOSPACE TECHNOLOGIES TO REMOVE CEO RICK WHEELER AND CFO THOMAS MCENTIRE 
* LEMELSON CAPITAL SAYS OWNS ABOUT 10 PERCENT OF OUTSTANDING SHARES OF GEOSPACE TECHNOLOGIES STOCK FOR CLIENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
